Text: Hey I do have one question. Do yu know if yu can transfer save data from the pc version to the emulaor? Because I've been playing the PC version but am ticked about the whole MIDI thing. Thanks in advance.

Well I don't think there is any way to convert the files. There very well possibly could be. But I am unsure as to weather or not you can use your save game files from the PC version. Try googling it, I'm sure you might be able to find something.
Dude once I figured out the right plugins to use in the sonfig wizard the emu worked great. Thanks for the torrent man. =]
